Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, this film depicts his adolescence through the evil schemes of the local agriculture cooperative and the ideological rule enforced by the military-backed government of those days.
